name: Huang Desang
autobiography: I am a software engineer with over 3 years of experience specializing in Android, iOS, and IoT app development. I have integrated Bluetooth and WiFi functionality, built client libraries, and expanded my skills into backend development using Node.js and MySQL. Additionally, I am proficient in Flutter for cross-platform app development, which helps streamline personal projects. My strong foundation in app engineering is supported by a passion for learning new technologies and solving complex problems.
school: Xingguo School of Management | Department of Information Management
